editedFacts.appliances: Dishwasher, Dryer, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range / Oven, Refrigerator, Washer
editedFacts.rooms: Dining room, Family room, Laundry room, Master bath, Mud room, Office, Pantry, Recreation room, Sun room, Walk-in closet

response.whatOwnerLoves: This is the home you have been waiting for! Custom Saddletree home in coveted neighborhood close to schools, parks, Flying Horse Country Club, restaurants and shopping. Impeccably maintained main level living with 3 bedrooms on main. Great room concept with open kitchen, dining and living areas. Don't miss the opportunity to take in the views and sunshine from the gorgeous sun room with walk out to backyard. The stylish kitchen features new stainless steel appliances, counter/breakfast bar, and pantry. The large master with sitting area and lots of light features an adjoining 5 piece bath and walk in closet. 1 of main level bedrooms currently being used as an office. The basement retreat features large open recreation room, media room, home gym and 2 additional bedrooms with shared bath. A large, unfinished storage area accommodates seasonal storage. Extensive landscaping throughout the yard features a water feature and privacy in backyard. Don't miss this opportunity to see your new home today!
